column4: Is there an "alternative" CD install for the server version of Ubuntu? I only see the altenative install for the desktop distro.
there is no need for an alternative server cd
the server cd does not install with a X11 gui

That's odd - maybe I didn't have the server CD install. I got a nice live CD when I booted off it. The problem being that there is no software RAID configuration in the GUI whereas the alternative CD has it.
